video.title: Bloodline
video.synopsis: When the black sheep son of a respected family threatens to expose dark secrets from their past, sibling loyalties are put to the test.

episodes.synopsis: Trouble starts when oldest son Danny Rayburn comes home for the 45th anniversary celebration of his parents' hotel in the Florida Keys' Islamorada.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: An accident exposes old wounds, complicating the already difficult situation between Danny and his family.
episodes.title: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With Robert’s condition uncertain, Danny re-considers staying in Islamorada. Meg’s personal and professional obligations become overwhelming.
episodes.title: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The family adjusts to Danny’s new role at the inn.  John and Marco discover a burned boat connected to their murder case.
episodes.title: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: A sudden tragedy unsettles the Rayburn clan.  While searching for evidence in his case, John finds something disturbing from the family’s past.
episodes.title: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: John wants to keep Danny in the fold, but Danny learns an awful truth about the past. Meg takes on a new client. Kevin's personal life takes a turn.
episodes.title: Part 6

episodes.synopsis: John and Marco get a lead in their investigation. Meg does her best to help Carlos. Kevin comes clean with Danny.
episodes.title: Part 7

episodes.synopsis: Kevin recovers at Sally's house after he's robbed. Danny makes a deal with Carlos. John and Marco identify one of the murdered girls.
episodes.title: Part 8

episodes.synopsis: The DEA gets involved in John's murder case. Tensions rise between Meg and Danny. John digs into Danny's past. Sally reminisces.
episodes.title: Part 9

episodes.synopsis: As Meg and Sally move forward with the wedding plans, John and Marco's investigation points them in Danny's direction.
episodes.title: Part 10

episodes.synopsis: After John confronts Carlos about Danny’s illicit behavior, John, Kevin and Meg figure out a plan to save the family.
episodes.title: Part 11

episodes.synopsis: Danny’s past and present troubles become a threat to the Rayburns. Sally confronts her family.
episodes.title: Part 12

episodes.synopsis: John, Kevin and Meg try to get their lives back in order as the family comes to grips with the truth about Danny.
episodes.title: Part 13
